name: Saree Bill Generator (Excel Load)
description: A web application for saree manufacturers to load inventory from an Excel file, then create and download customer bills in PDF format. Select saree types, specify quantities, and generate a professional bill.
prompt: Saree Bill Generator: Load your saree inventory from an Excel file. Select sarees, specify quantities, input customer details, and generate professional PDF bills with GST calculations. Ideal for saree manufacturers and retailers.
